summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2002, for the improvement of 1st Avenue South from the south margin of Junction Street to the north margin of Commercial Street, which will connect with the proposed bridge of the Oregon and Washington Railway Company, by the construction of a bridge 26 feet in width, the location of the bridge to be as follows: the west side of the bridge to be 2 feet form the west margin of 1st Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 20407 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
